SELECT IOI.ORDER_SN "orderSn", IOI.REFERER "referer", IRIO.DELIVERY_SN "deliverySn", CASE IRIO.STATUS WHEN 'application' THEN '申请中' WHEN 'audit' THEN '已审核待确认退款' WHEN 'cancelled' THEN '已取消' WHEN 'unusual' THEN '收包异常' WHEN 'receivedPacket' THEN '已收包待审核' WHEN 'completed' THEN '已退款' WHEN 'auditNoPass' THEN '审核不通过' ELSE IRIO.STATUS END "status", CASE IRIO.IS_INVOICE WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END "isInvoice", IRIM.GOODS_NAME "goodsName", IOI.USER_NAME "userName", IOI.MOBILE "mobile", IOI.ADDRESS "address", IRIO.PROCESS_TIME "processTime", IRIO.CUSTOM_AUDIT_TIME "auditTime" FROM IUNI_RETURNGOODS_INFO IRIO LEFT JOIN IUNI_RETURNGOODS_ITEM IRIM ON IRIO.DELIVERY_SN = IRIM.DELIVERY_SN LEFT JOIN IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI ON IRIO.ORDER_SN = IOI.ORDER_SN LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT (ORDER_SOURCE_CODE) SOURCE_CODE, ORDER_SOURCE_NAME SOURCE_NAME FROM IUNI_ORDER_SOURCE WHERE ORDER_SOURCE_CODE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ORDER_SOURCE_CODE) IOS ON IOI.REFERER = IOS.SOURCE_CODE
AND IOI.REFERER = #orderSource#
AND IRIO.STATUS = #status#
AND IRIO.ADD_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND IRIO.ADD_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
ORDER BY IOI.ORDER_SN, IRIO.DELIVERY_SN

SELECT IOI.ORDER_SN "orderSn", IOI.REFERER "referer", IEI.EXCHANGE_SN "exchangeSn", CASE IEI.SSTATUS WHEN 'cancle' THEN '已取消' WHEN 'cancleWaitDelivery' THEN '取消待发货' WHEN 'waitReceivePackage' THEN '待收包' WHEN 'receivePackageUnusual' THEN '换货收包异常' WHEN 'waitInitialCheck' THEN '待售后初检' WHEN 'waitGassAudit' THEN '待售后审核' WHEN 'shipped' THEN '已发货' WHEN 'signed' THEN '已签收' WHEN 'completed' THEN '已完成' WHEN 'waitCustomerAudit' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN 'waitDelivery' THEN '待发货' WHEN 'cancleToRepairs' THEN '转报修' WHEN 'cancleToReturn' THEN '转退货' WHEN 'cancleToOther' THEN '作废' ELSE IEI.SSTATUS END "status", IEIM.GOODS_NAME "goodsName", CASE WHEN IOI.USER_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN IOI.USER_NAME ELSE IEI.REFERER END "userName", IOI.MOBILE "mobile", IOI.ADDRESS "address", IEI.RECEIVE_PACKET_TIME "receiveTime", IEI.GASS_AUDIT_TIME "checkTime", IEI.CUSTOM_AUDIT_TIME "auditTime", IEI.F_SHIPPING_TIME "shippingTime" FROM IUNI_EXCHANGEGOODS_INFO IEI LEFT JOIN IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI ON IEI.ORDER_SN = IOI.ORDER_SN LEFT JOIN IUNI_EXCHANGEGOODS_ITEM IEIM ON IEI.EXCHANGE_SN = IEIM.EXCHANGE_SN
AND ( IOI.REFERER = #orderSource# OR IEI.REFERER = #orderSource# )
AND IEI.SSTATUS = #status#
AND IEI.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND IEI.CREATE_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
ORDER BY IOI.ORDER_SN, IEI.EXCHANGE_SN

SELECT IOI.ORDER_SN "orderSn", IOI.REFERER "referer", IRI.REPAIRS_SN "repairSn", CASE IRI.SSTATUS WHEN '0' THEN '已取消' WHEN '1' THEN '待收包' WHEN '4' THEN '报修收包异常' WHEN '3' THEN '待售后初检' WHEN '14' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN '5' THEN '待售后维修' WHEN '15' THEN '待付款' WHEN '2' THEN '待发货' WHEN '6' THEN '已发货' WHEN '8' THEN '已签收' WHEN '10' THEN '已完成' WHEN '16' THEN '转退货' WHEN '17' THEN '转换货' WHEN '18' THEN '作废' WHEN '19' THEN '取消待发货' ELSE IRI.SSTATUS END "status", IRIM.GOODS_NAME "goodsName", CASE WHEN IOI.USER_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN IOI.USER_NAME ELSE IRI.REFERER END "userName", IOI.MOBILE "mobile", IOI.ADDRESS "address", IRI.RECEIVE_PACKET_TIME "receiveTime", IRI.INITIAL_CHECK_TIME "checkTime", IRI.CUSTOM_AUDIT_TIME "auditTime", IRI.F_SHIPPING_TIME "shippingTime" FROM IUNI_REPAIRSGOODS_INFO IRI LEFT JOIN IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI ON IRI.ORDER_SN = IOI.ORDER_SN LEFT JOIN IUNI_REPAIRSGOODS_ITEM IRIM ON IRI.ORDER_SN = IRIM.ORDER_SN
AND ( IOI.REFERER = #orderSource# OR IEI.REFERER = #orderSource# )
AND IEI.SSTATUS = #status#
AND IEI.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND IEI.CREATE_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
ORDER BY IOI.ORDER_SN, IRI.REPAIRS_SN
